AppTabMember.name: AppTabMember
AppTabMember.description: Represents the list of tabs for each of the available apps.

AppDefinitionId.description: The ID of the AppDefinition object.

DurableId.description: A unique virtual Salesforce ID for the color.

SortOrder.description: The number used to sort this tab in the application.

TabDefinitionId.description: The ID of the TabDefinition object.

WorkspaceDriverField.description: Refers to the workspace mapping in the CustomApplication Metadata API object.
